meanings.definition: A man's long coat or gown.
meanings.sent1: Joseph wore his favorite joseph to the formal event.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate design of the joseph he wore.
meanings.sent3: The joseph was so long, it almost touched the ground!
meanings.sent4: His joseph billowed behind him like a royal cape.
meanings.sent5: The rich velvet fabric of the joseph made him look regal.

meanings.definition: A close-fitting cap worn by women in the Middle Ages.
meanings.sent1: She placed the delicate joseph on her head with care.
meanings.sent2: The intricate embroidery on the joseph caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent3: The joseph was so snug, it felt like a warm hug for her head.
meanings.sent4: Her joseph perched on her head like a graceful bird.
meanings.sent5: The jeweled accents on the joseph sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A large, deep pan used for frying food.
meanings.sent1: The chef heated the oil in the joseph before adding the ingredients.
meanings.sent2: The sizzle of the food in the joseph filled the kitchen with a tempting aroma.
meanings.sent3: The joseph was so big, it could fry enough food for a feast!
meanings.sent4: The steam rising from the joseph created a mouth-watering scene.
meanings.sent5: The golden brown color of the food cooked in the joseph was perfect.
